article_title: County Pulse: Should undocumented immigrants be allowed to purchase Obamacare insurance?
article_text:
Consumer groups and health advocates support the idea

State would need to ask feds for exception to ACA

Report to Covered California board concludes it is doable

article_metadata.news-keywords: undocumented immigrants, consumer groups, immigration, buy, health insurance, covered california, health exchange
article_metadata.description: Consumer groups and immigration advocates want state and federal government to allow undocumented immigrants to buy health insurance through the Covered California health exchange.
article_metadata.title: County Pulse: Should undocumented immigrants be allowed to purchase Obamacare insurance? | The Modesto Bee
